content: and colours materials yarn yarn weight dk / light-3 ≈11 wpi fiber acrylic or wool/acrylic blend non-fuzzy works best for relief stitches hook 4 0 mm g-6 or size to obtain your fabric 3 5 mm for tighter appliqués optional suggested palette matches your bougainvillea series dk weight us #3 light at the beginning of each round the yarn colours are indicated good options stylecraft special dk 100 g ≈ 322 yds / 295 m and scheepjes colour crafter similar elasticity and thickness if you prefer cotton scheepjes cahlista is a good option but elasticity is slightly lower depending on your gauge you may need to add 1 2 chains spring green 1316 jade 2177 kelly green 1826 dandelion 1856 fondant 1241 pomegranate 1083 yardage sample approximate total usage in the sample 298 gr 1 758 mts 1 919 yds your yardage may vary due to yarn brand hook size and personal gauge breakdown by shade approximate shade grs mts yds spring green 60 177 193 jade 38 32 35 kelly green 100 295 322 dandelion 2 6 6 fondant 28 83 90 pomegranate 20 59 64 total 298 1 758 1 919 bougainvillea abbreviations & special stitches us terms beg beginning blo back loop only chain chain chain-# space chain-# space space created by a chain of # double_crochet double_crochet dtr double treble_crochet fp front post prefix used with stitches taken around the post e g fp-double_crochet fp- half_double_crochet fp half_double_crochet aka hdcfp front post half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet ldc long double_crochet popcorn popcorn work 5 double_crochet in the same st/space remove hook insert in first double_crochet pick up loop from last double_crochet pull through close with chain 1 if indicated puff3 puff with 3 pulls close with chain 1 repeat repeat r round single_crochet single_crochet scfp single_crochet front post skip skip space space slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch es treble_crochet treble_crochet tr3tog treble 3 together three trebles closed together trfp2tog front post treble 2 together round 85 spring green corner start in the chain-1 corner space work 2 double_crochet ch1 2 double_crochet side a in the next two chain-1 spaces work 2 double_crochet with ch1 between each this double_crochet b 2dc with ch1 between in the chain-1 space r84 side c 1fptr in the next double_crochet d repeat b and c 40 more times e in the next two chain-1 spaces repeat a repeat in another corners and sides to finish de round close with 1 slip_stitch in the first double_crochet total 168fptr 42 per side 392 double_crochet 94 per side 4 per corner 192 chain-1 space 47 per side 1 per corner continue images r85 round 86 spring green corner start in the chain-1 corner space work 2 double_crochet ch1 2 double_crochet side a in the next two double_crochet and in the next two chain-1 spaces work 2 double_crochet with ch1 between each this double_crochet b move to the next chain-1 space and work 2dc with ch1 between each this double_crochet c ch1 skip treble_crochet r85b repeat b
